content: कनखलं <ab>N.</ab> of a Tīrtha or sacred place and the hills adjoining it; तीर्थं कनखलं नाम गंगाद्वारेऽस्ति (पावनं); तस्माद्गच्छेरनुकनखलं शैलराजावतीर्णां जह्नोः कन्याम् <ls>Me. 50.</ls>
कनखल <ab>N.</ab> of a village near Hardvāra which is situated on the Ganges at the southern base of the Sewalika mountains. कनखत was also the name of the surrounding mountains.
